at_buyonida_we_are_more_than_just_a_team:
At Buyonida, we are more than just a team — we are a collective of innovators, creators,
                                and dreamers committed to building exceptional Buyonida experiences. Our journey began
                                with a simple idea: to empower businesses to thrive in the digital world through
                                beautiful, functional, and effective online stores.
every_project_we_take_on_is_an_opportuni:
Every project we take on is an opportunity to bring fresh ideas to life, create lasting
                                impact, and push the boundaries of what’s possible.

                                        that

we_don_t_just_deliver_a_product_we_build:

                                        success.

your_next_success_story_starts_here_get_: Your next success story starts here — get in touch with Buyonida.
name: Name
we_collect_information_about_you_in_thre:
We collect information about you in three main ways: information you provide, information
                                collected automatically, and information obtained from other sources.
when_you_register_with_buyonida_use_our_:
When you register with Buyonida, use our services, or contact us, you may provide the
                                following personal data:
name_email_address_phone_number_shipping:
: Name, email address, phone number, shipping and
                                    billing addresses.
username_password_and_other_account_rela:
: Username, password, and other account-related
                                    details.
credit_card_details_bank_account_informa:
: Credit card details, bank account information, or
                                    other payment methods used for transactions.
store_name_business_type_tax_identificat:
: Store name, business type, tax identification
                                    numbers, and other details about your business.
information_you_upload_or_provide_such_a:
: Information you upload or provide, such as product
                                    descriptions, customer data, and communications with Buyonida Support.
when_you_use_our_services_we_automatical: When you use our services, we automatically collect certain data, including:
ip_address_browser_type_operating_system:
: IP address, browser type, operating system,
                                    device identifiers, pages visited, links clicked, and time spent on our platform.
approximate_location_based_on_ip_address:
: Approximate location based on IP address or other
                                    geographic data.
we_may_receive_information_about_you_fro: We may receive information about you from third parties, such as:
payment_processors_app_developers_or_mar:
: Payment processors, app developers, or marketing partners
                                    providing data to improve our services.
publicly_available_data_such_as_governme:
: Publicly available data such as government records or
                                    social media.
information_submitted_by_other_users_int:
: Information submitted by other users interacting with your
                                    store, such as customer reviews or inquiries.
we_use_your_personal_data_to_provide_mai:
We use your personal data to provide, maintain, and improve our services, and to comply with
                                legal obligations. Main purposes include:
to_process_transactions_manage_your_acco:
: To process transactions, manage your account, provide
                                    customer support, fulfill orders, and enable store management.
to_recommend_products_features_or_conten:
: To recommend products, features, or content based on
                                    your preferences and behavior.
to_send_transactional_emails_e_g_order_c:
: To send transactional emails (e.g., order
                                    confirmations), respond to inquiries, and send updates about your account or
                                    services.
with_your_consent_to_send_promotional_em:
: With your consent, to send promotional emails, newsletters,
                                    and partner offers related to Buyonida products and services.
to_analyze_usage_trends_conduct_research:
: To analyze usage trends, conduct research,
                                    and enhance platform functionality, security, and performance.
to_detect_and_prevent_fraud_abuse_and_se:
: To detect and prevent fraud, abuse, and
                                    security risks for you, other users, and Buyonida.
to_comply_with_relevant_laws_and_regulat:
: To comply with relevant laws and regulations, such
                                    as tax reporting or responding to legal requests.
we_process_your_data_based_on_the_follow: We process your data based on the following legal grounds:
to_fulfill_our_agreement_with_you_for_re:
: To fulfill our agreement with you for
                                    registered services.
to_operate_our_business_improve_services:
: To operate our business, improve services,
                                    prevent fraud, and maintain customer relations.
for_specific_purposes_such_as_marketing_:
: For specific purposes such as marketing, based on your
                                    explicit consent.
to_meet_regulatory_or_legal_requirements: : To meet regulatory or legal requirements.
we_may_also_use_anonymized_or_aggregated:
We may also use anonymized or aggregated data for analytics, reporting, and service
                                improvement.
we_share_personal_data_only_with_third_p:
We share personal data only with third parties when necessary to provide services, comply
                                with legal obligations, or protect our rights. Common scenarios include:
we_share_data_with_trusted_partners_that: We share data with trusted partners that help operate our platform, such as:
for_storing_and_managing_data_on_secure_:
: For storing and managing data on secure
                                    servers.
to_analyze_usage_and_improve_services: : To analyze usage and improve services.
to_deliver_targeted_ads_and_promotional_:
: To deliver targeted ads and promotional content
                                    with your consent.
to_facilitate_shipping_and_order_fulfill: : To facilitate shipping and order fulfillment.
comply_with_laws_regulations_or_valid_le: Comply with laws, regulations, or valid legal processes (e.g., subpoenas).
investigate_or_enforce_violations_of_our: Investigate or enforce violations of our Terms of Service or policies.
detect_prevent_or_address_fraud_abuse_or: Detect, prevent, or address fraud, abuse, or security issues.
fulfill_corporate_and_social_responsibil: Fulfill corporate and social responsibility obligations.
protect_the_rights_property_and_safety_o: Protect the rights, property, and safety of Buyonida, users, or the public.
in_cases_of_mergers_acquisitions_restruc:
In cases of mergers, acquisitions, restructuring, or business transitions, personal data may
                                be shared during discussions or after completion. Data may be transferred under
                                confidentiality agreements to potential or actual acquirers.
for_example_when_you_install_a_third_par:
For example, when you install a third-party app via the Buyonida App Store that accesses your
                                store data, we may share data with your explicit consent.
depending_on_your_location_and_applicabl:
Depending on your location and applicable laws, you may have certain rights and choices
                                regarding your personal data.
most_of_your_personal_data_can_be_access:
Most of your personal data can be accessed and updated directly from your Buyonida admin
                                panel. For data you cannot access or edit, submit a request via our online portal.
you_may_have_the_following_rights: You may have the following rights:
request_a_copy_of_your_stored_personal_d: : Request a copy of your stored personal data.
request_correction_of_inaccurate_or_inco: : Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data.
request_deletion_of_your_data_subject_to:
: Request deletion of your data, subject to legal retention
                                    requirements.
request_your_data_in_a_structured_machin:
: Request your data in a structured, machine-readable
                                    format, or transfer it to another provider.
request_to_restrict_certain_data_process:
: Request to restrict certain data processing under specific
                                    circumstances.
object_to_processing_based_on_legitimate:
: Object to processing based on legitimate interests,
                                    including for marketing purposes.
exercising_these_rights_will_not_result_:
Exercising these rights will not result in different service levels or additional charges. Use
                                our online portal or contact us as detailed in Section 9.
to_opt_out_of_marketing_messages_click_t:
To opt out of marketing messages, click the “unsubscribe” link in emails, update preferences
                                in your Buyonida account, or contact us. Transactional emails (e.g., order confirmations)
                                essential to service delivery cannot be opted out of.
we_retain_your_personal_data_only_as_lon:
We retain your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was
                                collected, including:
meeting_legal_tax_and_accounting_obligat: Meeting legal, tax, and accounting obligations.
if_you_close_your_buyonida_store_or_stop:
If you close your Buyonida store or stop using our services, we retain your data for up to
                                two years, after which it is deleted or anonymized unless longer retention is required by
                                law (e.g., for tax or audit purposes).
the_amount_nature_and_sensitivity_of_the: The amount, nature, and sensitivity of the data.
the_potential_risk_of_unauthorized_use_o: The potential risk of unauthorized use or disclosure.
the_purposes_for_which_data_is_processed: The purposes for which data is processed.
once_no_longer_needed_we_securely_delete: Once no longer needed, we securely delete or anonymize your data.
our_services_are_not_intended_for_childr:
Our services are not intended for children under 13 (or under 16 in some jurisdictions). We
                                do not knowingly collect data from children under 13 without parental consent.
if_we_learn_that_such_data_has_been_coll:
If we learn that such data has been collected, we will delete it immediately. If you believe
                                we have such data, please contact us as described in Section 9.
we_implement_industry_standard_technical:
We implement industry-standard technical and organizational measures to protect personal data
                                from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. These include:
protection_of_data_during_transmission_a: : Protection of data during transmission and storage.
limiting_access_to_personal_data_to_auth:
: Limiting access to personal data to authorized
                                    personnel only.
using_reliable_cloud_providers_with_robu:
: Using reliable cloud providers with robust
                                    security protocols.
monitoring_systems_and_addressing_vulner:
: Monitoring systems and addressing vulnerabilities
                                    through testing.
despite_our_efforts_no_system_is_complet:
Despite our efforts, no system is completely secure. We are committed to protecting your data
                                and responding promptly to any incidents.
we_may_update_this_privacy_policy_to_ref:
We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or
                                industry standards. For significant changes, we will notify you via:
posting_the_updated_policy_on_our_websit: Posting the updated policy on our website with a "Last Updated" date.
sending_notices_via_email_or_through_the: Sending notices via email or through the platform if required by law.
continued_use_of_our_services_means_you_:
Continued use of our services means you accept the changes. We recommend reviewing this
                                policy periodically.
if_you_have_questions_about_this_privacy:
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we process your personal data, please
                                contact us via:
buyonida_support_via_our_contact_page_or:
: Buyonida Support via our contact page or data request
                                    portal.
buyonida_international_ltd_ashiq_molla_j:
: Buyonida International Ltd., Ashiq Molla Juma Street 60, Baku,
                                    Azerbaijan.
to_use_buyonida_services_you_must_create: To use Buyonida services, you must create a user account (“Account”). You must provide your full legal name, business address, phone number, valid email address, and other required information to complete registration. Buyonida may reject your registration or cancel an existing Account at its sole discretion.
you_must_meet_one_of_the_following_to_us: You must meet one of the following to use the services:
if_between_13_18_you_may_only_use_the_se: If between 13–18, you may only use the services under parental or legal guardian supervision and acceptance of terms;
if_your_country_s_age_of_majority_is_hig: If your country’s age of majority is higher than 18, you must meet that age.
you_confirm_that_you_use_buyonida_servic: You confirm that you use Buyonida services solely for commercial purposes, not personal or household use.
buyonida_will_use_your_registered_email_: Buyonida will use your registered email for primary communication. You must keep it up-to-date and functional.
you_are_responsible_for_keeping_your_pas: You are responsible for keeping your password secure. Buyonida is not liable for any loss from your negligence in this area. You are solely responsible for all activity and content shared through your Account.
violation_of_the_terms_or_acceptable_use: Violation of the Terms or Acceptable Use Policy may result in immediate suspension of services.
the_individual_registering_for_the_servi: The individual registering for the services (“Store Owner”) is the party to this Agreement. If you register on behalf of your employer, that legal entity is considered the store owner.
you_confirm_you_have_the_authority_to_bi: You confirm you have the authority to bind the employer to these terms. If enrolled in Buyonida Payments, a Google Pay account may be created on your behalf.
depending_on_your_plan_you_may_create_em: Depending on your plan, you may create employee accounts with restricted access. The Store Owner defines access levels and is responsible for all actions of such users.
domains_registered_through_buyonida_will: Domains registered through Buyonida will auto-renew annually. You are responsible for disabling auto-renewal if desired.
buyonida_may_offer_services_to_competito: Buyonida may offer services to competitors and provides no exclusivity in any market segment. Employees and contractors may also be users or sellers and may compete without using your confidential data.
in_case_of_ownership_disputes_buyonida_m: In case of ownership disputes, Buyonida may request:
last_4_digits_of_a_credit_card: Last 4 digits of a credit card,
buyonida_reserves_the_right_to_determine: Buyonida reserves the right to determine and assign account ownership. Accounts may be suspended during disputes.
buyonida_may_modify_suspend_or_refuse_se: Buyonida may modify, suspend, or refuse service at any time.
you_must_comply_with_buyonida_s_acceptab: You must comply with Buyonida’s Acceptable Use Policy and all applicable laws.
commercial_use_of_any_service_part_witho: Commercial use of any service part without written permission is prohibited.
you_may_not_advertise_using_buyonida_tra: You may not advertise using Buyonida trademarks or similar domains/keywords.
your_materials_excluding_credit_card_dat: Your materials (excluding credit card data) may be transmitted unencrypted and adapted technically. Credit card data is always encrypted.
you_agree_to_pay_all_subscription_transa: You agree to pay all subscription, transaction, and additional fees (apps, domains, third-party services, etc.).
you_must_provide_and_maintain_a_valid_pa: You must provide and maintain a valid payment method. Charges will continue until services are cancelled.
if_payment_fails_buyonida_will_try_3_tim: If payment fails, Buyonida will try 3 times, every 3 days. After failed attempts, your account may be suspended.
buyonida_claims_no_ownership_over_your_m: Buyonida claims no ownership over your materials. However, you grant a non-exclusive, royalty-free, global license for service operation and improvement.
buyonida_s_software_designs_and_content_: Buyonida’s software, designs, and content are protected by intellectual property rights. Use of brand elements requires written permission.
you_may_cancel_your_account_at_any_time_: You may cancel your account at any time. Buyonida may suspend or terminate without notice in the following cases:
all_dues_become_payable_immediately_afte: All dues become payable immediately after termination. Account data is retained for 2 years.
buyonida_is_not_liable_for_indirect_inci: Buyonida is not liable for indirect, incidental, or special damages. You agree to indemnify Buyonida for:
in_case_of_conflict_between_versions_the: In case of conflict between versions, the English version prevails.
buyonida_may_transfer_these_terms_withou: Buyonida may transfer these terms without notice. You may do so only with written consent.
buyonida_mmc_60_ashiq_molla_juma_st_baku: : Buyonida MMC, 60 Ashiq Molla Juma St., Baku, Azerbaijan.
error_loading_cart_please_try_again_late: Error loading cart. Please try again later.
something_went_wrong_please_try_again_or: Something went wrong. Please try again or use a different payment method
thank_you_for_your_purchase_we_ll_start_: Thank you for your purchase. We'll start preparing your order right away!
brend_loqonu_v_a_qlaman_yaz_ki_insanlar_: Brend loqonu və açıqlamanı yaz ki, insanlar səni tanısın
ma_azan_n_bir_ad_se_narahat_olma_sonrada: Mağazan üçün bir ad seç, narahat olma, sonradan dəyişdirə biləcəksən
use_your_first_and_last_name_as_they_app: Use your first and last name as they appear on your government-issued ID.
if_you_forget_your_password_you_can_rese: If you forget your password, you can reset it from here.
view_and_access_stores_connected_to_your: View and access stores connected to your Shopify account.
when_you_re_logged_in_to_buyonida_this_i:
When you're logged in to Buyonida, this is the language you will see.
                                        It doesn't affect the language your customers see on your online store.
please_enter_your_email_new_password_and: Please enter your email, new password, and the OTP code sent to your email.
error_loading_store_sections_please_try_: Error loading store sections. Please try again later.
a_short_description_about_product_you_wi:
A short description about product. You will see product details and good sentences in

error_loading_checkout_please_try_again_: Error loading checkout. Please try again later.
your_card_has_been_successfully_register: Your card has been successfully registered. You can now use it for payments.
